body_html: Since both vectorAdd and tf crashed after wakeup, I consider this a Cuda driver issue. TensorFlow holds an active context the entire time. And it seems that the Cuda driver has a problem restoring the active context after the wakeup.
body_text: Since both vectorAdd and tf crashed after wakeup, I consider this a Cuda driver issue. TensorFlow holds an active context the entire time. And it seems that the Cuda driver has a problem restoring the active context after the wakeup.
body: Since both vectorAdd and tf crashed after wakeup, I consider this a Cuda driver issue. TensorFlow holds an active context the entire time. And it seems that the Cuda driver has a problem restoring the active context after the wakeup.
